content: puff wheat granny square @riiksberg 9 3 2024 materials yarn of your choice and a hook that matches the size on your yarn label i used novita 7 veljestä yarn aran 4-ply and a size 4 00 mm hook and the finished square ended up being approximately 16×16 cm in size notes the pattern is written in us terms the square is worked in the round starting from the middle and with the right side up for every round stiches chain chain yarn over pull through the loop on your hook slip_stitch slip_stitch insert hook into the work yarn over pull through the stitch and the loop on your hook single_crochet single_crochet insert hook into the work yarn over pull through the work yarn over pull through remaining loops on you hook long chain lch pull yarn through the existing loop on your hook to make it looser and match the height of a puff puff puff st *yarn over insert hook into the work yarn over pull the yarn through to make a long loop* repeat *-* 2 times yarn over and pull through all the loops on you hook close the puff with one additional chain which is pulled tight note this closing chain is not counted as an actual chain and it is not shown in the diagram double_crochet double_crochet yarn over insert hook into the work yarn over pull through the work yarn over pull through 2 loops yarn over pull through remaining loops on you hook pattern round 1 chain 4 slip_stitch into 1st chain to make a loop round 2 chain 1 8 single_crochet into loop slip_stitch into 1st single_crochet round 3 lch puff st into 1st single_crochet *5 chain 2 puff st* repeat *-* 2 times 5 chain puff st slip_stitch into puff st note after making the last puff st it may look as though there is still one single_crochet left on round 2 but this is actually the slip_stitch and can be ignored round 4 lch puff st in between the first and last puff stiches of the last round be careful to include the lch of the last round into puff st on the left side *2 chain 2 double_crochet 2 chain 2 double_crochet into ch5 space 2 chain 2 puff st in between the next two puff stiches of the last round* repeat *-* 2 times 2 chain 2 double_crochet 2 chain 2 double_crochet into ch5 space 2 chain puff st in the same space as the first puff st of this round slip_stitch into puff st round 5 lch puff st in between the first and last puff stiches of the last round *2 chain double_crochet into the next 2 double_crochet s of the last round from here on this is abbreviated as 2/4/6/8 double_crochet into double_crochet 2 double_crochet 2 chain 2 double_crochet into ch2 space 2
